member.name: P:NameGenerator.GamerTagGenerator.Space
member.summary: What character is to be used as a space

member.name: M:NameGenerator.GamerTagGenerator.Generate
member.summary: Method that generates a gamertag, taking into account generation flags such as whether to add numbers or not

member.name: T:NameGenerator.IGenerator
member.summary: Top level class regarding the different name Generators

member.name: M:NameGenerator.IGenerator.Generate
member.summary: Method that generates names, gamertags, etc.
member.returns: string that contains the name generated

member.name: T:NameGenerator.IGenerator.NameTypes
member.summary: Enum containing all the different generator flags

member.name: F:NameGenerator.IGenerator.NameTypes.None
member.summary: No Flags, just simple name generation

member.name: F:NameGenerator.IGenerator.NameTypes.Numbers
member.summary: A number between 0 and 999 will be appended to the name

member.name: F:NameGenerator.IGenerator.NameTypes.Hashtag
member.summary: A hashtag will come before the name

member.name: T:NameGenerator.NameGenerator
member.summary: This is the generator subclass for generating real names. Contains a single method for the generation of a name.

member.name: F:NameGenerator.NameGenerator.GeneratorFlags
member.summary: These are enum flags regarding generation settings, such as whether or not to append numbers to the name

member.name: P:NameGenerator.NameGenerator.Space
member.summary: String that is used instead of a space character, by default it is set to space

member.name: M:NameGenerator.NameGenerator.Generate
member.summary: This method generates a random real name, taking generation flags and the chosen space character into account
member.returns: A string containing a random first and last name, seperated by the chosen space character
